subject: New Sweep Board

I changed some resistor values and the caps i went with 22uf.  Created  
sort of a random sweep, look how the voltage drops off and starts up  again.  
Tomorrow i will test it in a radio.
 
_http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QLJASgFB4LU_ 
(http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QLJASgFB4LU) 
 
 
-Steve
